title: What if the world suddenly stopped?
body: Imagine what would happen if the earth just suddenly... stopped. Nothing else, only the earth. Would we be sent flying off into the final frontier?

title: League of Legends: Never making it to plat again
body: I'm too devoted to ARAM. It's a slippery slope once you try some ARAM.
